input: <web-search mcp-server="ydc-server">Find current information about: landing page strategy gallery pricing table responsive design patterns 2026</web-search>
output:
I found current information about landing page design strategies, pricing tables, and responsive design patterns for 2026. Here are the key insights:

## Key Landing Page Design Trends for 2026:

**Modern Design Patterns:**
- Interactive and dynamic content elements
- Minimalist layouts with bold typography
- Micro-interactions and animations for engagement
- Mobile-first responsive design approaches
- Speed optimization as a critical factor

**Pricing Table & Gallery Strategies:**
- Clear, comparison-focused pricing tables
- Visual hierarchy for plan differentiation
- Interactive pricing calculators
- Gallery sections showcasing product/service examples
- Social proof integration (testimonials, case studies)

**Responsive Design Best Practices:**
- Fluid grids and flexible layouts
- Touch-friendly navigation for mobile
- Adaptive images and media queries
- Progressive enhancement approach
- Performance optimization across devices

**SaaS-Specific Trends:**
- Value-driven messaging above the fold
- Product screenshots and demo videos
- Trust signals (security badges, client logos)
- Clear CTAs with minimal friction
- Personalization based on user segments

Sources:
- [Landing Page Design Trends by Industry (2026 Guide) | involve.me](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-design-trends)
- [10 SaaS Landing Page Trends for 2026 (with Real Examples) - SaaSFrame](https://www.saasframe.io/blog/10-saas-landing-page-trends-for-2026-with-real-examples)
- [283 SaaS Landing Page UI Design Examples in 2026](https://www.saasframe.io/categories/landing-page)
- [9 Landing Page Trends For 2026](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-trends)
- [Landing Page Design Trends for 2026](https://www.zoho.com/landingpage/landing-page-design-trends.html)
- [Top Landing Page Design Trends for B2B SaaS in 2026 - SaaS Hero](https://www.saashero.net/content/top-landing-page-design-trends/)
- [Landing Page Design Trends for 2026 - GDJ](https://graphicdesignjunction.com/2026/01/landing-page-design-trends-2026/)

input: <web-search mcp-server="ydc-server">Find current information about: document image augmentation OCR text similarity 2024</web-search>
output:
I found several relevant research papers and articles from 2024 about document image augmentation, OCR, and text similarity. Here are the key findings:

## Recent Research & Developments (2024)

**1. Transformer-Based OCR with Generative Data Augmentation**
- Recent work focuses on leveraging transformer models combined with synthetic data generation for improved OCR accuracy
- Paper published in Electronics (MDPI) in December 2024

**2. OCR2SEQ: Machine Learning Advancement**
- Published in Journal of Big Data (June 2024)
- Innovative approach combining OCR with sequence-to-sequence learning

**3. Post-OCR Correction with Synthetic Data**
- ArXiv paper from August 2024 provides comparative study on using synthetic data for improving OCR results
- Focuses on correcting OCR errors after initial text extraction

**4. Data Augmentation Techniques**
- Effective augmentation methods for OCR training include:
  - Geometric transformations (rotation, scaling, skewing)
  - Noise injection and blur effects
  - Synthetic data generation
  - Text rendering with various fonts and backgrounds

**5. Advanced Preprocessing for OCR Accuracy**
- Image preprocessing techniques significantly improve OCR results:
  - Binarization and thresholding
  - Noise reduction
  - Deskewing and perspective correction
  - Contrast enhancement

**6. Multimodal Models**
- TextMonkey and CLIP ViT-L14 represent newer approaches combining vision and language understanding
- OCR-free large multimodal models emerging as alternatives to traditional OCR

**7. LLM-Based Post-Processing**
- Reference-based post-OCR processing using Large Language Models for improving accuracy
- Particularly effective for handling diacritics and special characters

Sources:
- [Leveraging Transformer-Based OCR Model with Generative Data Augmentation](https://www.mdpi.com/2079-9292/14/1/5)
- [Advancing machine learning with OCR2SEQ](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-024-00927-4)
- [Advancing Post-OCR Correction: A Comparative Study of Synthetic Data](https://arxiv.org/html/2408.02253v2)
- [Effective Data Augmentation for OCR](https://medium.com/data-science/effective-data-augmentation-for-ocr-8013080aa9fa)
- [Data Augmentation for Offline Handwritten Text Recognition](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s42979-023-02583-6)
- [TextMonkey: An OCR-Free Large Multimodal Model](https://arxiv.org/html/2403.04473v2)
- [Reference-Based Post-OCR Processing with LLM](https://arxiv.org/html/2410.13305v1)
- [Enhance OCR Accuracy: Preprocessing Images Effectively](https://www.infrrd.ai/blog/preprocessing-images-for-ocr)

input: <web-search mcp-server="ydc-server">Find current information about: 한국 정부사이트 PDF 다운로드 curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 해결 2026</web-search>
output:
Based on my search, I found relevant information about resolving SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL issues when downloading PDFs from Korean government websites using curl. Here's what I found:

## Common Solutions for SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL with curl

### 1. **Disable SSL Certificate Verification (for curl)**

**Method 1: Command-line option**
```bash
curl --insecure -O https://www.example.com/file.pdf
# or use short form
curl -k -O https://government-site.go.kr/file.pdf
```

**Method 2: Configuration file**
```bash
echo "insecure" > ~/.curlrc
```

### 2. **For Korean Government Sites (정부24) - Specific Issues**

Common problems when accessing Korean government websites:
- **Network connectivity issues** - Check your WiFi/data connection
- **Certificate chain problems** - Government sites may use internal CAs
- **Browser/security module conflicts** - Update security programs
- **Cache/cookie issues** - Clear browser cache

### 3. **Trust Custom CA Certificates**

If the government site uses an internal CA certificate:

```bash
# Specify CA certificate path
curl --cacert /path/to/ca-certificate.crt https://government-site.go.kr/file.pdf

# For GitLab embedded OpenSSL
/opt/gitlab/embedded/bin/openssl s_client -CAfile /path/to/cert.crt -connect hostname:443
```

### 4. **Debugging SSL Connection**

Test the SSL connection:
```bash
# Test connection and view certificate details
echo | openssl s_client -connect government-site.go.kr:443

# View certificate information
openssl x509 -in certificate.crt -text -noout
```

### 5. **Common SSL Errors and Solutions**

- **SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL** - Often caused by:
  - Incomplete certificate chains
  - Untrusted CA certificates
  - Network connectivity issues
  - TLS version mismatches

### 6. **For OpenSSL 3 Compatibility (2026)**

Starting from 2026, OpenSSL 3 requirements:
- TLS 1.2 or higher required
- Certificates must have minimum 112-bit security
- RSA/DSA/DH keys must be at least 2048 bits

### Recommended Approach for Government Sites:

1. **First, try with insecure flag** (for testing):
   ```bash
   curl -k -O https://government-site.go.kr/document.pdf
   ```

2. **If that works, properly install the CA certificate**:
   ```bash
   # Download the root CA from the government site
   # Add it to your trusted certificates
   sudo cp government-ca.crt /etc/ssl/certs/
   sudo update-ca-certificates
   ```

3. **For persistent issues with 정부24**:
   - Update your browser and security modules
   - Check certificate validity period
   - Ensure proper network connection
   - Contact support: ☎ 1588-2188

## Sources:
- [정부24 오류 해결 가이드 5단계(2026)-인증서, 접속 오류 한 번에 끝내기](https://myemotionbank.com/gov24-error-resolution-guide)
- [개발툴 SSL인증서 오류 해결하는 linux 명령 설정 모음](https://couplewith.tistory.com/494)
- [SSL 문제 해결 | GitLab 공식 기술 문서 한글판](https://gitlab-docs.infograb.net/omnibus/settings/ssl/ssl_troubleshooting.html)

input: <web-search mcp-server="ydc-server">How do I find information about: pendlay row deficit tutorial youtube 2026?</web-search>

**YouTube Tutorials:**

1. **[Exercise Tutorial - Deficit Pendlay Row](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0NDZ2Kh1Jc)** - A detailed tutorial from 2021

input: <web-search mcp-server="ydc-server">Find current information about: CFTC commitments of traders current week report 2025 download txt file</web-search>
output:
Perfect! I found the information you need. The CFTC publishes weekly Commitments of Traders reports in text file format. Here's the current information:

## Current Week COT Reports (January 13, 2026)

The CFTC provides downloadable text files in comma-delimited format for the current week's reports:

### **Disaggregated Reports:**
- **Futures-Only**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/f_disagg.txt
- **Futures and Options Combined**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/c_disagg.txt

### **Traders in Financial Futures:**
- **Futures-Only**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/FinFutWk.txt
- **Futures and Options Combined**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/FinComWk.txt

### **Legacy Reports:**
- **Futures-Only**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/deafut.txt
- **Futures and Options Combined**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/deacom.txt
- **Commodity Index Report**: https://www.cftc.gov/dea/newcot/deacit.txt

## Key Information:
- Reports are based on **Tuesday's data** and published **Friday at 3:30 PM ET**
- Current report date: **January 13, 2026**
- All files are in **comma-delimited text format** (.txt) ready for spreadsheet import
- You can sign up for email notifications at: https://service.govdelivery.com/accounts/USCFTC/subscriber/new

## Sources:
- [Commitments of Traders | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm)
